white: Young pin collectors who become pin fetishists as adults.
The people that buy Dibbler's sausages.
Daphne, 91, of Whistler Street, who has a penchant for amusingly-shaped vegetables.
The schedule of sacrifices at the Temple of Small Gods.
Gently kissing the inside of someone's knee.
Standing on a footstool so you can give Captain Carrot a kiss.
Trying to kill rats smarter than you are.
Not being able to spell wizard.
A sketch in the Times of Commander Vimes' truncheon.
Getting spanked by Adora Belle Dearheart.
Sweating as you try to believe in Sergeant Detritus' safety catch.
Ignoring the clattering on your roof because it's Exam Week at the Assassins' Guild.
Culling the young Assassins now and then.
Having a fight with a runaway cart and losing.
The intrinsic horror of a zombie that uses exfoliating soap.
Playing the cello with all the vampiric seduction you can muster.
The Guild of Butlers, Vallets, and Gentlemen's Gentlemen.
Sybil Ramkin fingering open the Duke of Ankh.
Getting a look at a dwarf's mineshaft.
The Guild of Ecdysiasts, Nautchers, Cancanieres and Exponents of Exotic Dance.
Saint Nethers maternity and lying-in hospital.
A wizard's robes and sparkly hat. And staff! Don't forget the staff!.
The bowel-lacerating concoction Rufus Drumknott had for breakfast.
Going into the wrong temple by accident and bursting into flames.
Getting it hard from your butler.
Knowing that bribing the Patrician's clerk with money instead of stationery is a fool's errand.
Leonard of Quirm's erotically charged art.
A donation made payable to the Ankh-Morpork widows' and orphans' fund.
The natural futility of the revolution.
A  genuine Burleigh & Stronginthearm made-to-measure crossbow with a polished walnut stock and silver tooling.
Fred Colon and Nobby Nobbs, crime-fighting duo.
Soliciting with Amourous Intent, Dollymopping, Alley-catting and Lascivious Enticing for Financial Reward Without a Current Seamstresses' Guild License.
Rubbing the Dean's belly until he falls asleep.
Knowing that Nobby Nobbs will steal it, no matter what you do.
The letters to the editor in the Ankh-Morpork Times.
An uncomfortably realistic but nonetheless enjoyable fantasy where the Patrician has you murdered.
Getting a pity discount at the seamstress' guild.
Getting it on with your lady's maid.
The beatific smile of Captain Carrot.
The Guild of Fools and Joculators.
The corpse of Lupine Wonse hanging awkwardly from a fence post.
A nice woman from Lancre who can't Morris Dance at all.
The eighth son of an eighth son.
Old man Sonky and his penny-a-packet preservatives.
Wishing that Moist von Lipwig would cheat on his wife with you.
Paying attention to the health of your personal clerk's bowels.
The Glorious Battle of the 25th of May.
Carrying a set of lockpits for the most innocent of reasons.
This new thing called labour laws.
Losing your receipt from your mugging.
Being unable to solve an argument without puns.
A soggy mess we're calling pizza, for some reason.
The sudden appearance of C.M.O.T. Dibbler, sausage in hand.
When the full moon starts rising while you and your werewolf boyfriend are going at it.
Some mad wan running about with her broomstick between her legs  to give it a jump start.
Getting arrested, just for being a thief!.
The Guild of Hot Women With Swords.
Getting a puppy for Hogswatch dinner.
A very nice snuff box that contains the soul of a dead child.
A dedicated cellar for travelling zombies.
Dark Clerks on the Patrician, crawling over him like weevils.
A cheeky drink on Hogwatch Night.
Knowing that democracy is when the Patrician does what he wants.
Marrying above your station, having some children you hate, getting the portrait done, and then getting Assassinated, just as the gods intended.
Shutting your curtains and hiding behind your furniture when Constable Visit comes around.
The going rate for a tuppenny upright.
Some good old music with rocks in.
The fanciful idea of Ankh-Morpork eateries having a food hygiene rating.
Getting naked and having a nice promenade through the Palace Menagerie.
Having the same doctor as your horse.
Increasingly desperate attempts to seduce the Patrician.
The religious argument Constables Visit and Dorfl have been embroiled in for two weeks straight.
What to do in Ankh-Morpork if you're dead, or even if you're not.
Explaining to the exchange lad from Quirm why you said "falling onto" the river instead of "falling into".
The most upperclass masturbatory experience the ladies in the Entertainment District can offer.
The end of the world as we know it (again).
Pronouncing the names of towns in Llamedos.
The ghost of a ham sandwich at the Dolphin Inn.
Ignoring the explosions from the Guild of Alchemists.
Hiring some goats to mow your lawn.
The hyperfixations of your average Temperance League vampire.
Wanting to see what the Hogfather has in his sack.
Learning how to nick things in the army.
Just a bit of gods-damned peace.
Going down on the Patrician's aunt so that the Patrician won't have you hanged.
A bottle of Wow Wow Sauce.
Everyone admiring your legs in tights.
Waking up half-naked in the stables outside the back of Mrs Palm's.
Getting killed by Ankh-Morpork's latest nonsense.
The Igorina clinic in Slippery Back.
Rattling your drawers to praise Anoia.
Girls stopping in the street to swoon over Sally von Humpeding.
Carrying banned weaponry when you don't even need it to kill someone.
A wet, soppy kiss from Nobby Nobbs.
The Guild of Trespassers, previously the Ankh-Morpork Explorers Society.
Rufus Drumknott's regularly scheduled bowel movements.
Getting hanged within an inch of your life by the Patrician.
Anything that comes out of Carrot's mouth.
Men with red hair called Charlie.
Feeling the sharp edge of Adora Belle Dearheart's stiletto heel.
Cedric, Head Torturer at the Patrician's Palace.
Lord Downey's crush on the Patrician.
Knowing that dog can talk, but not wanting to admit to it.
A very cold winter in Bonk.
Trying to deal with the thrice-damned lords and ladies.
Getting a dribbly candle commissioned in the shape of your dead husband's cock.
Fucking the Patrician over his desk.
The grinding, gravelly sound of trolls fucking.
The legendary sexual prowess of Fred Colon.
Doctor Lawn trying to keep a straight face as you tell him how you hurt your cock.
Getting arrested by a fucking dog.
Wanting to bring back the monarchy, for some fucking reason.
Doctor Lawn trying to keep a straight face as you tell him what's stuck up your arse.
All the sex Reg Shoe is having right now, and you can't stop him.
Receiving a tasteful dick pic via clacks.
The sexual appeal of Windle Poons.
Rumours that the Patrician is fucking his head clerk.
The inherent gamble in paying for a handjob from an Igor in the Entertainment District.
Filling Mr Boggis with helium and watching him float away.
Being expected to pay your fucking taxes.
Vigorous sex with your personal clerk.
Having a sexually-charged relationship with your boogeyman.
Trying to chase Rincewind the Wizzard down for a shag.
The thrumming sexual tension between your chef and your valet.
Being really into vampires. Like, sexually.
Being the Postmaster, Bank Chairman, and Primary Sexual Fantasy of Ankh-Morpork.
Moist von Lipwig's bowlegged walk the day after being reunited with his wife.
Wondering what goblins do when they have a wank.
The strong, sexually appealing tongue of the avid philatelist.
Waiting for all of the bells to stop ringing out the hour so you can get some fucking kip.
Trying to shag Commander Vimes' butler.
Getting bitten by a vampire during sex.
Doing a shit in Reacher Gilt's eyehole.
An unrealistic but nonetheless enjoyable fantasy where you are summoned to the Patrician's office and he fucks you over his desk.
Fucking the Postmaster General on the steps of the Patrician's Palace.
Having thirty young tailors team up to put you through a heart-stopping gangbang.
The pet dragon on your shoulder shitting down your back.
